Title: An Act Changing the Name of Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Tobias Fornier, Province of Antique, to Governor Mamerto Portillo Memorial District Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 315
An Act Changing the Name of Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Tobias Fornier, Province of Antique, to Governor Mamerto Portillo Memorial District Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Tobias Fornier, Province of Antique, is changed to Governor Mamerto Portillo Memorial District Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
